description: This file provides configuration setup for a ticket booking backend application. It includes functions to construct database URIs from environment variables and configure a Flask app with necessary settings, including database connection and security keys.

methods.name: get_database_uri()
methods.description: Constructs the database URI from environment variables, with handling for missing or invalid port values and override options.

methods.name: configure_app(app)
methods.description: Configures a Flask application with database URI, track modifications, JWT secret, and exception propagation based on environment variables.
